episodes.title: Loaded Language -  You Didn't Leave The Truth!
episodes.description:
Check out "My LDS Journey," I highly recommend it:

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL5F1EB3B4F919226D


I apologize for the unnecessary noise in this video. I'm still getting used to a lapel microphone. My voice occasionally distorts. You can here my zipper rattling. I bang on the microphone with my hand near the end. And I think a 1/8" plug that I wasn't using was banging against the selfie stick. Hopefully it all didn't make the video unwatchable! 


Some reading on Thought Reform and Loaded Language:

http://changingminds.org/techniques/conversion/lifton_thought_reform.htm
http://www.rationalrevelation.com/tr/loadlang.html
https://freedomofmind.com/use-of-words-loaded-language-and-thought-control-of-believers/


My email: danielwiebe77@yahoo.com
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints
